D35.formula: IF(N25="","","The graph can be used for comparison with a non-steady-sate level in order to evaluate the PK model and make an empiric dose adjustment.")

D36.formula: IF(J15="2.0 mg/L","Note: Consider switching to a different antibiotic when S. aureus MIC ≥ 2.0 mg/L.  Etest method may yield higher MICs than broth microdilution.",IF(J15="Empiric or 1 mg/L","",IF(J15="0.5 mg/L","")))

D37.formula: IF(AND(F14="mg/dL",E14<0.7),"Consider rounding SCr up to 0.7 mg/dL.",IF(AND(F14="µmol/L",E14<61.88),"Note: Consider rounding SCr up to 61.88 µmol/L.",IF(OR(F14="mg/dL",E14>=0.7),"",IF(OR(F14="µmol/L",E14>=61.88),""))))

D38.formula: IF(N26<36,"",IF(N26>=36,"Note: When the dosing interval is >24 hours, the AUC is higher during the first 24 hours of the dosing interval compared to the last 24 hours of the interval."))

D39.formula: IF(AND(N26=8,(N25/E16)>18,F16="kg"),"The calculator's dose is greater than 18 mg/kg q8h; consider decreasing the maintenance dose.",IF(AND(N26=8,(N25/E16)<=18,F16="kg"),"",IF(AND(N26=8,(N25/(E16/2.20462))>18,F16="lbs"),"The calculator's dose is greater than 18 mg/kg q8h; consider decreasing the maintenance dose.",IF(AND(N26=8,(N25/(E16/2.20462))<=18,F16="lbs"),"",IF(N26>8,"")))))

D40.formula: IF(N25*(24/N26)>4000,"Consider reserving total daily doses >4 grams for patients such as <55 yrs old, >110 kg, and CrCl >150 mL/min.",IF(N25*(24/N26)<=4000,""))

D41.formula: IF(J16="none","",IF(J16="Forearm (IBW -1.5%)","",IF(J16="Entire arm (IBW -4%)","",IF(J16="Foot (IBW -1.5%)","Note: For lower limb amputations use the patient's height prior to amputation.",IF(J16="Below knee (IBW -3.5%)","Note: For lower limb amputations use the patient's height prior to amputation.",IF(J16="Above knee (IBW -11%)","Note: For lower limb amputations use the patient's height prior to amputation.",IF(J16="Entire leg (IBW -16%)","Note: For lower limb amputations use the patient's height prior to amputation.",IF(J16="Multiple (IBW -20%)","Note: For lower limb amputations use the patient's height prior to amputation.",IF(J16="Multiple (IBW -25%)","Note: For lower limb amputations use the patient's height prior to amputation.",IF(J16="Multiple (IBW -30%)","Note: For lower limb amputations use the patient's height prior to amputation.",IF(J16="Multiple (IBW -35%)","Note: For lower limb amputations use the patient's height prior to amputation.")))))))))))

D42.formula: IF(AND(H26>40,J25>0),"The loading dose may cause a peak >40 mcg/mL.  Consider decreasing the loading dose.",IF(OR(H26<=40,J25=0),""))

D43.formula: IF(AND(J15="Empiric or 1 mg/L",N29>700),"The AUC24 may be >700 mg*hr/L.  Consider decreasing the total daily dose.",IF(AND(J15="Empiric or 1 mg/L",N29<=700),"",IF(AND(J15="0.5 mg/L",N29>1400),"The AUC24 may be >700 mg*hr/L.  Consider decreasing the total daily dose.",IF(AND(J15="0.5 mg/L",N29<=1400),"",IF(AND(J15="2.0 mg/L",N29>350),"The AUC24 may be >700 mg*hr/L.  Consider decreasing the total daily dose.",IF(AND(J15="2.0 mg/L",N29<=350),""))))))

E52.formula: IF(D51="Time of level (same day as dose)",((E51+F51/60)-(E49+F49/60)),IF(D51="Time of level (1 day after dose)",(24-(E49+F49/60)+E51+F51/60),IF(D51="Time of level (2 days after dose)",(24-(E49+F49/60)+E51+(F51/60)+24),IF(D51="Time of level (3 days after dose)",(24-(E49+F49/60)+E51+(F51/60)+48)))))

T52.formula: IF(D51="Time of level (same day as dose)",((E51+F51/60)-(E49+F49/60))-E48/T18,IF(D51="Time of level (1 day after dose)",(24-(E49+F49/60)+E51+F51/60)-E48/T18,IF(D51="Time of level (2 days after dose)",(24-(E49+F49/60)+E51+(F51/60)+24)-E48/T18,IF(D51="Time of level (3 days after dose)",(24-(E49+F49/60)+E51+(F51/60)+48)-E48/T18))))

D57.formula: IF(J15="2.0 mg/L","Note: Consider switching to a different antibiotic when S. aureus MIC ≥ 2.0 mg/L.  Etest method may yield higher MICs than broth microdilution.",IF(J15="Empiric or 1 mg/L","",IF(J15="0.5 mg/L","")))

D58.formula: IF(AND(F14="mg/dL",E14<0.7),"Consider rounding SCr up to 0.7 mg/dL.",IF(AND(F14="µmol/L",E14<61.88),"Consider rounding SCr up to 61.88 µmol/L.",IF(OR(F14="mg/dL",E14>=0.7),"",IF(OR(F14="µmol/L",E14>=61.88),""))))

D59.formula: IF(N49<36,"",IF(N49>=36,"Note: When the dosing interval is >24 hours, the AUC is higher during the first 24 hours of the dosing interval compared to the last 24 hours of the interval."))

D60.formula: IF(T52<0,"Warning: The level may be artificially elevated because it was drawn less than 60 minutes after the end of infusion.",IF(T52>=0,""))

D61.formula: IF(E52<(1+E48/T18),"Note: The level was drawn less than 1 hour after the END of infusion, so it may be artificially high (still in distribution phase).",IF(E52>=(1+E48/T18),""))

D62.formula: IF(AND(N49=8,(N48/E16)>18,F16="kg"),"Caution: The calculator's dose is greater than 18 mg/kg q8h; consider decreasing the maintenance dose.",IF(AND(N49=8,(N48/E16)<=18,F16="kg"),"",IF(AND(N49=8,(N48/(E16/2.20462))>18,F16="lbs"),"Caution: The calculator's dose is greater than 18 mg/kg q8h; consider decreasing the maintenance dose.",IF(AND(N49=8,(N48/(E16/2.20462))<=18,F16="lbs"),"",IF(N49>8,"")))))

D63.formula: IF(ABS(E50-T48)>10,"Caution: The level is significantly different than predicted by using population kinetics.  This patient may require a higher degree of clinical judgment.","")

J72.formula: IF(D69="Use estimated Ke and Vd",T85,IF(D69="Vd is known",T85,IF(D69="Ke is known","")))

E75.formula: IF(D74="Time of level (same day as dose)",(E74+F74/60)-(E73+F73/60),IF(D74="Time of level (1 day after dose)",(24-(E73+F73/60)+E74+F74/60),IF(D74="Time of level (2 days after dose)",(24-(E73+F73/60)+E74+(F74/60)+24),IF(D74="Time of level (3 days after dose)",(24-(E73+F73/60)+E74+(F74/60)+48)))))

D79.formula: IF(D69="Use estimated Ke and Vd","When using an estimated Ke and Vd the AUC24 is only an estimate.  To calculate an AUC24 based on a steady-state level either Vd or Ke must be known.",IF(D69="Ke is known","",IF(D69="Vd is known","")))

D80.formula: IF(AND(J15="Empiric or 1 mg/L",J70>700),"Warning: The AUC24 may be >700 mg*hr/L for the current dose.  Consider decreasing the total daily dose.",IF(AND(J15="0.5 mg/L",J70>1400),"Warning: The AUC24 may be >700 mg*hr/L for the current dose. Consider decreasing the total daily dose.",IF(AND(J15="2.0 mg/L",J70>350),"Warning: The AUC24 may be >700 mg*hr/L for the current dose. Consider decreasing the total daily dose.",IF(AND(J15="Empiric or 1 mg/L",J70<=700),"",IF(AND(J15="0.5 mg/L",J70<=1400),"",IF(AND(J15="2.0 mg/L",J70<=350),"","ERROR"))))))

D81.formula: IF(J15="2.0 mg/L","Note: Consider switching to a different antibiotic when S. aureus MIC ≥ 2.0 mg/L.  Etest method may yield higher MICs than broth microdilution.",IF(J15="Empiric or 1 mg/L","",IF(J15="0.5 mg/L","")))

D82.formula: IF(AND(F14="mg/dL",E14<0.7),"Consider rounding SCr up to 0.7 mg/dL.",IF(AND(F14="µmol/L",E14<61.88),"Consider rounding SCr up to 61.88 µmol/L.",IF(OR(F14="mg/dL",E14>=0.7),"",IF(OR(F14="µmol/L",E14>=61.88),""))))

D83.formula: IF(N70<36,"",IF(N70>=36,"Note: When the dosing interval is >24 hours, the AUC is higher during the first 24 hours of the dosing interval compared to the last 24 hours of the interval."))

D85.formula: IF(ABS(E72-W76)>10,"The trough is >10 mcg/mL different than predicted with population kinetics. Verify accuracy of the patient data.","")

D99.formula: IF(T93<(0.8*E29),"Warning: The levels may have been drawn too close together, Ke may not be accurate.",IF(T93>=(0.8*E29),""))

D100.formula: IF(J15="2.0 mg/L","Note: Consider switching to a different antibiotic when S. aureus MIC ≥ 2.0 mg/L.  Etest method may yield higher MICs than broth microdilution.",IF(J15="Empiric or 1 mg/L","",IF(J15="0.5 mg/L","")))

D101.formula: IF(N90<36,"",IF(N90>=36,"Note: When the dosing interval is >24 hours, the AUC is higher during the first 24 hours of the dosing interval compared to the last 24 hours of the interval."))

D102.formula: IF(E91<(1+E89/T18),"The first level was drawn less than 1 hour after the end of infusion, so it may be artificially high (still in distribution phase).",IF(E91>=(1+E89/T18),""))

D115.formula: IF(J15="2.0 mg/L","Note: Consider switching to a different antibiotic when S. aureus MIC ≥ 2.0 mg/L.  Etest method may yield higher MICs than broth microdilution.",IF(J15="Empiric or 1 mg/L","",IF(J15="0.5 mg/L","")))

D116.formula: IF(N107<36,"",IF(N107>=36,"Note: When the dosing interval is >24 hours, the AUC is higher during the first 24 hours of the dosing interval compared to the last 24 hours of the interval."))

D117.formula: IF(E109<(1+E106/T18),"Note: The peak was drawn less than 1 hour after the END of infusion, so it may be artificially high (still in distribution phase).",IF(E109>=(1+E106/T18),""))

D131.formula: IF(J15="2.0 mg/L","Note: Consider switching to a different antibiotic when S. aureus MIC ≥ 2.0 mg/L.  Etest method may yield higher MICs than broth microdilution.",IF(J15="Empiric or 1 mg/L","",IF(J15="0.5 mg/L","")))

D132.formula: IF(J126<=24,"",IF(J126>24,"When the dosing interval is >24 hours, the AUC is higher during the first 24 hours of the dosing interval compared to the last 24 hours of the interval."))

D147.formula: IF(J138="","","Calculating the AUC24 during elimination can be useful in the setting of very slow clearance.  The calculation assumes no additional doses are given.")
